name: HowlingBeagles
0:
”Alexa, ask Howling Beagles to howl”
”Alexa, ask Howling Beagles for a howl”
”Alexa, tell Howling Beagles to howl”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: howling beagles
des: Beagles love to howl, just ask them to! Wednesday (the girl) and Pugsley (the boy) are beagles who live in Hollywood, get parts in movies, and enjoy outdoor dining at fine restaurants. Every night when their human parents come home from work, they greet them with this howl.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
